traits.name: Beast of Burden
traits.description: The mule is considered to be a Large animal for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

traits.name: Sure-Footed
traits.description: The mule has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
